

Reciever LRC ---
10010 | 10011 | 00111 | 10011 | 11001 | 01010 | 11110 | 01110 | 11010 | 00100 | 11100 | 

Reciever VRC ---
100100 | 100111 | 001111 | 100111 | 110011 | 010100 | 111100 | 011101 | 110101 | 001001 | 

Reciever checksum ---
10010 |10011 |00111 |10011 |11001 |01010 |11110 |01110 |11010 |00100 |11010 |

Reciever CRC ---
100100011 | 100111001 | 001111001 | 100110000 | 110011101 | 010101101 | 111100100 | 011100001 | 110101000 | 001001100 |
